headline: Huntington Refreshes Risk Leadership As Category III Oversight Shapes Outlook
summary: Huntington Bancshares (NasdaqGS:HBAN) has appointed Senthil Kumar as Chief Risk Officer. The bank has also added three former Cadence Bank directors to its board. These leadership moves come as Huntington advances its post Cadence merger integration. The company now operates under Category III regulatory standards, which carry more stringent oversight. Huntington Bancshares is a regional banking group focused on consumer, commercial, and small business banking. It is now operating at a...
